title: Results: Lauren Stephens and Brennan Wertz Win 2024 USA Cycling Gravel National Championships
content:
Tight racing in Gering, Nebraska on September 8 saw Stephens and Wertz walk away with $10,000 each, as well as automatic qualification for the 2024 UCI Gravel World Championships in Belgium.

Read the full article at Results: Lauren Stephens and Brennan Wertz Win 2024 USA Cycling Gravel National Championships on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
